name: Gastón Algaze
tagline: Knowledge Craftsman, Agile Coach, Software Architect & PMP.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub Page.
… Hey! How are you? You probably came here to learn a little bit more about myself and my work. From this place you’ll be able, not only to know me and contact me but also to read some thoughts I usually write in my blog. Leading IT portfolios is my main area of expertise and currently I’m working as the Head of IT in one of the largest entertainment companies in Argentina, leading teams, collaborating with people, growing together and most importantly, having fun.

Please visit http://www.gastonalgaze.com where you'll be able to find more detailed information.

Cheers!

//Gastón
